meanings.definition: The quality or state of being impassable.
meanings.sent1: The impassablenesses of the mountain range made it impossible for the hikers to continue.
meanings.sent2: The impassablenesses of the thick forest prevented any vehicles from passing through.
meanings.sent3: The impassablenesses of the maze confused the participants in the race.
meanings.sent4: The impassablenesses of the bureaucracy created delays in the project.
meanings.sent5: The impassablenesses of the river were a barrier to the explorers' progress.

meanings.definition: The inability to be passed or traveled through.
meanings.sent1: The explorers were frustrated by the impassablenesses of the dense jungle.
meanings.sent2: The road was closed due to the impassablenesses caused by the fallen trees.
meanings.sent3: The impassablenesses of the traffic jam made everyone late for work.
meanings.sent4: The student's procrastination created impassablenesses in completing the assignment on time.
meanings.sent5: The impassablenesses of the language barrier hindered communication between the two groups.
